channel.title: CW and Medic (ugh) buff suggestion
channel.description:
CW - give him Reanimate as a day Ability. He's really borring right now and this can help.
Phys (seriously, get a better name than medic) - Bring back Exhumain as a day ability that gives it's results at the start of the night. Make quarantine a day Ability that make heal remove poison and bleed. Give it 2 or 3 uses. MAKE SURE IT CAN BE CANCELLED

item.description:
Patch was reverted. My suggestion is now moot. Someone please lock this thread @Ashe

item.title: CW and Medic (ugh) buff suggestion
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
This is a tough time in our kingdom. All the changes that no one wanted are happening(except everyone crying over Kings allies). Like the princess buff(why)
And the physi…medic nerf. Like he’s already boring as he is. There’s so much more. Hopefully this will get reversed

Read full topic
